headline: Does Berkshire's Building Products Arm Aid Its Manufacturing Business?
summary: BRK.B's building-products arm drives up to 45% of manufacturing earnings, adding strength through cyclical shifts.

headline: Before The Crowd Sees It, I'm Positioning For A Super Bullish New Year
summary: I see stagflation and recession fears as overblown, with leading indicators pointing toward economic recovery. Read more about the market outlook here.
